field.label: Locked
field.helptext: A user becomes locked out after 5 unsuccessful login attempts. Only an admin user can unlock the affected user.

skuid__text.contents: Are you sure you want to permanantly delete this image?  You can't undo this.

action.message: There was an error deleting the image

skuid__text.contents:
Are you sure you want to reset the password for

{{first_name}} {{last_name}}

action.message: User's Password has been reset. An email has been sent to the User containing a link allowing the User to change their password.

enableConditions.message: For security purposes, you can only update your email from the My Settings page.
